column4: General sample ID(s) or Name(s). Provided by collector.
The International Geo Sample Number. An alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies samples taken from our natural environment, as well as related sampling features. It is assigned by SESAR.
The depth. May be expressed in m (subposition may be specified in cm), mbsf (meter below seafloor, drill cores), or mbs (meter below surface, drill cores)
The year the sample was collected. Expressed in yyyy format. (e.g. 2022)
